resources.string: Help Abroad is designed to quickly connect you with emergency services when you\'re travelling. To provide you with the best assistance, we need a few permissions.
To help you quickly find local emergency numbers and provide your location to services if needed, please grant location access.

Granting location access allows Help Abroad to identify the country you are in for relevant emergency numbers and helps services find you faster in an emergency. Your location is only used when you actively use the app for these purposes.
To allow you to directly call emergency services from the app, please grant permission to make phone calls.

This permission is needed so you can tap a number within Help Abroad and immediately initiate a call to emergency services without leaving the app. We will never make calls without your direct action.
To allow you to contact specific emergency services via SMS.

This permission enables Help Abroad to directly send an SMS to official emergency numbers that support text messaging. This can be vital if a voice call isn\'t possible or suitable for you. Messages are only sent when you choose to use this specific feature to contact these services.
This permission is crucial for the app to function correctly.
This permission is permanently denied. Please enable it manually in the app settings if needed.
